name: CS Add Social Fields to Admin Area
author: Chetan Satasiya

sections.description: This plugin will add Social Profile Fields into the user detail page.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘CS Add Social Fields to Admin Area’
  3. Activate CS Add Social Fields to Admin Area from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download CS Add Social Fields to Admin Area
  2. Upload the ‘cs-add-social-fields-to-admin-area’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate CS Add Social Fields to Admin Area from your Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Compatible with the latest WordPress versions

1.0.0

  • Initial release

upgrade_notice: Automatic updates should work great for you. As always, though, we recommend backing up your site prior to making any updates just to be sure nothing goes wrong.
